name: Sweet Girl Room Design
description:
Be creative and highlight your artistic qualities as you design the perfect teen room for your best friend. Of course you must give it a special touch so not only that you will use the trendiest furniture pieces and colors, but you must put your heart and soul into this project.

you can show your creative skills and decorate a bedroom just the way you like it. With this free decorating game you can select the room type you want, before choosing a bed, seating option, desk, wall hangings, lights, rugs, wardrobes, as well as windows, floor type, wall colour, and any final finishing touches.

Features:
• Easily select a room you would like to decorate for yourself.
• Find and decorate the room with the bed of your dreams.
• Add a comfortable seating option for friends to sit in.
• Have fun choosing a desk and mirror to complete your hair and makeup before heading out.
• Decorate the room by adding wall hangings and lights to compliment your bedroom.
• Accessorize by adding a rug or wardrobe that matches your bed and wall hangings.
• Renovate and add an additional window to let more sunlight in.
• Change the floor to timber, tiles or carpet to add that extra effect.
• Decorate and change the wall colour and patterns for that unique style.
• Add the final finishing touches with teddies, lamps, plants and more.
